definition: The word "rasch" refers to the quality of being quick or fast. It is commonly used to describe actions or movements that are performed with great speed or efficiency.

examples.german: Sie antwortete rasch auf die E-Mail.
examples.english: She responded promptly to the email.

examples.german: Er erledigte die Aufgabe rasch und effizient.
examples.english: He completed the task quickly and efficiently.
